# Resist Touch (Spell)
## Overview
[[Abjuration Spells|Abjuration]]

**Level:** [[1st Level Cleric Spells|Cleric 1]], [[2nd Level Sorcerer Spells|Sorcerer 2]], [[2nd Level Wizard Spells|Wizard 2]]

**BoXM:** [[BoXM 2nd-Level Cleric Spells List|Cleric 2]], [[BoXM 3rd-Level Wizard Spells List|Wizard 3]]

**Casting Time:** 1 standard action

**Components:** V, S

**Range:** Close (25 feet + 5 feet/two levels)

**Target:** One creature

**Duration:** 10 minutes/level

**Saving Throw:** None

**Spell Resistance:** No

**Source:** Book of Experimental Might I (Malhavoc Press), pg. 72

A subject that you designate gains a +2 luck bonus +1 per three caster levels (maximum +8) to his touch AC; note that this bonus cannot make the subjectâ€™s touch AC higher than his normal Armor Class*. Resist touch* simply bends fate to make the subject harder to touch.

It is said that dragons favor this spell.
